sentences.en: And he went out from Pharaoh in hot anger.
sentences.cn: 于是,摩西气忿忿的离开法老,出去了.

sentences.en: And Jacob blessed Pharaoh, and went out from before Pharaoh.
sentences.cn: 雅各又给法老祝福, 就从法老面前出去了.

sentences.en: Cupid draws his arrow on both footman and pharaoh.
sentences.cn: 爱神丘比特的箭已瞄准了沐浴在爱河中的人们.

sentences.en: Dathan : To use in your service, son of Pharaoh.
sentences.cn: 戴森: 那是用来服务您的, 法老之子.

sentences.en: He refused to have his portrait conventionalized into the customary smooth beauty of the pharaoh god.
sentences.cn: 他不让他的画像具有惯例的法老神的那种传统的温和的美.

sentences.en: He went out from Pharaoh and made supplication to the Lord.
sentences.cn: 出10:18摩西就离开法老去求耶和华.

sentences.en: I'm taking three baskets of bread to Pharaoh when the baskets fall.
sentences.cn: 我提着三个装着面包的篮子到法老去,篮子撒了.

sentences.en: Moving day, Pharaoh was in his room to see a new inter - accordion.
sentences.cn: 搬家那天, 老王在他的那间屋里看见一把崭新的手风琴.

sentences.en: One night Pharaoh had a strange dream.
sentences.cn: 一天夜晚，法老做了个怪梦。

sentences.en: Pharaoh's courtiers saw her and praised her to Pharaoh, and she was taken into Pharaoh's household.
sentences.cn: 法老的臣子看见她,就把她举荐给法老, 于是她就被带去收进法老的内宫中.

sentences.en: So Moses went out from Pharaoh and made supplication to the Lord.
sentences.cn: 出8:30于是摩西离开法老去求耶和华.

sentences.en: Such is Pharaoh king of Egypt to all who depend on him.
sentences.cn: 埃及王法老向一切倚靠他的人也是这样.

sentences.en: The pharaoh is Osiris, the moon bull incarnate.
sentences.cn: 这位法老就是俄西里斯，丰产神的化身。

sentences.en: They were not quasi-divine overmen like pharaoh or minos or the monarchs of mesopotamia.
sentences.cn: 他们并不像法老、弥诺斯或美索不达米亚君主那样类似上帝的超人。

sentences.en: What reason was Pharaoh to be given for letting the Israelites go ( 7:16 )?
sentences.cn: 法老以什麽原因让以色列人离开埃及?

sentences.en: Why do you harden your hearts as the Egyptians and Pharaoh did?
sentences.cn: 你们为何硬着心像埃及人和法老一样 呢 ?
